name: Dragon Skin
description: This skin is inspired by the legendary dragon of the east. It is said to bring good luck and fortune to those who wield it.

name: Ninja Skin
description: This skin is inspired by the stealthy and deadly ninja warriors of ancient Japan. It is perfect for those who prefer to strike from the shadows.

name: Pirate Skin
description: This skin is inspired by the swashbuckling pirates of the high seas. It is perfect for those who love adventure and treasure hunting.

name: Alien Skin
description: This skin is inspired by the extraterrestrial beings from outer space. It is perfect for those who want to show off their otherworldly powers.

name: Knight Skin
description: This skin is inspired by the brave and chivalrous knights of medieval times. It is perfect for those who want to defend their honor and protect the weak.
